title: text from a receipt
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415020719im_/http:/typophile.com/files/img010_6265.jpg)

I am searching for this kind of font or writing type that i found it on a receipt. Can I get any suggestions?
author: MafiooT

comments.content:
Here are a couple:  
SB Liquid [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/selfbuildtype/sb-liquid/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415020719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/selfbuildtype/sb-liquid/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/selfbuildtype/sb-liquid/")  
Ticket De Caisse [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ticket-de-caisse/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415020719/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ticket-de-caisse/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ticket-de-caisse/")  
Don
